pullrequest.title: Disable portion of AudioDecoder.CheerFile test since it's always failing (#1189)

content.raw:
I thought that it was important to reduce noise in the jenkins emails. This test fails 100% of the time on trusty, so it's just adding noise. It's in the issue tracker, so we shouldn't forget about it.

That's what we do for the physics tests that don't work with all the physics engines (disable parts with console messages and references to the issue tracker).
